snippet.title: Invasion | Remod | Half-Life | Trailer
snippet.description:
A HD pack for the Half-Life mod, Invasion.
This was made as another of my "Remod" projects but decided against making a new mod page in ModDB since the only thing added was just the regular models/sounds/sprites alterations instead of full blown map edits or coding alterations. Anyway, here it is. Enjoy!

It adds :

- HD Models.
- Texture Changes.
- HUD Changes.
- Sound FX Changes.
- Text Changes.

This Remod doesn't include the original files, so you'll have to install Invasion and its patches first before the Remod.

http://www.moddb.com/mods/half-life-invasion/addons/invasion-remod-10
http://www.half-lifecreations.com/forums/index.php?topic=2154
http://www.cry-of-fear.com/forum/index.php?topic=5221
